remarks: Cyclically shifting a word three times results in a once cyclically shifted word under certain circumstances.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
statement: 3cshw $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) = ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) ) $.
